title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Leonard Peltier remains defiant in AP interview, maintaining innocence and vowing continued activism
items.description: More than 50 years after a shootout on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation landed him in federal prison, Leonard Peltier remains defiant.

items.title: As the Texas outbreak grows, how contagious is measles, really?

items.title: What we know about the deaths of Gene Hackman and his wife
items.description: US investigators are trying to establish how Oscar-winning actor Gene Hackman and his wife Betsy died.

items.title: Hundreds in US climate agency fired in latest cuts
items.description: Around 880 workers - including weather forecasters - are reported to have lost their jobs.

items.title: Are egg producers inflating prices during the bird flu outbreak to boost profits?

items.title: Divers found dead, one in the jaws of a shark, near popular scuba spot
items.description: Two Russian tourists died while scuba diving, with one believed to have drowned and the other attacked by sharks, officials said.

items.title: Dozens arrested in global hit against AI-generated child abuse
items.description: At least 25 people were detained during a worldwide operation, Europol says.

items.title: Boris Spassky, who lost famed chess match to Bobby Fischer, dies at 88
items.description: Boris Spassky is best remembered for his duel with American Bobby Fischer in a legendary 1972 match that became a proxy for Cold War rivalries.

items.title: Minister questions how Tate brothers could leave Romania
items.description: The brothers face rape and human trafficking charges, which they deny.

items.title: What we know about US-Ukraine minerals deal

items.title: Rose Girone, thought to be the oldest living Holocaust survivor, dies at 113
items.description: Rose Girone, believed to be the oldest living Holocaust survivor and a strong advocate for sharing survivors' stories, has died. She was 113.
